home.title: Fingerprint Proficiency Test
home.subtitle: Participate in the fingerprint comparison study
home.new_participant_desc: Register to participate in the proficiency test
home.returning_desc: Log in with your access code
home.about_desc: This system allows professionals to participate in a blind proficiency test in fingerprint comparison. The goal is to assess the accuracy and reliability of examinations.
home.feature5: Ethics committee approval is not required
home.feature1_desc: Anonymized participants and unique randomized samples
home.feature3_desc: Each volunteer's contribution is very important. The system issues a unique and personalized certificate for each analyzed sample.
home.feature4_desc: Contribute to the development of papilloscopy as a forensic science by establishing accuracy rates in controlled tests
home.feature5_desc: This is anonymized research aimed at theoretical deepening of situations that emerge spontaneously from professional practice, as per Article 1, Section VII of CNS Resolution No. 510.

register.title: Participant Registration
register.name: Full Name
register.terms: I agree to participate in the study and accept the terms
register.success_message: Check your email to validate your account. Save your access codes:
register.codes_resent_message: We have resent an email with your access information.
register.verify_email_resent: Verification email resent! Check your inbox.
register.verify_email_required: You need to validate your email before logging in
register.tip1: Keep these codes in a safe place
register.tip2: You will receive an email with instructions
register.tip3: Use either code to log in

login.title: Login
login.instruction: Enter your access code (Voluntary Code or Carry Code)
login.help_text: You must register first to receive your access codes.

dashboard.subtitle: Here you can access your samples and submit results
dashboard.name: Name
dashboard.no_samples: No samples available at the moment.
dashboard.no_samples_desc: Samples will be generated automatically after your registration.

dp.title: Dashboard
dp.subtitle: Manage your proficiency test samples
dp.my_samples_desc: Complete the comparison tests below. Results are saved automatically after submission.
dp.no_samples_contact: Contact the administrator if this is an error.
dp.abandon_confirm: Are you sure you want to abandon sample {code}? This action cannot be undone.
dp.danger_zone_desc: When you delete your account, your personal data will be permanently erased. Results from completed evaluations will be kept anonymously for research purposes.
dp.delete_warning: This action is irreversible. When you delete your account:
dp.delete_personal_data: Your personal data (name, email) will be erased
dp.keep_results: Evaluation results will be kept anonymously
dp.error_new_sample: Error requesting new sample. Please try again.
dp.error_delete: Error deleting account. Please try again.
dp.error_reject: Error rejecting sample. Please try again.
dp.cert_unavailable: Certificate not available for this sample.
dp.cert_error: Error downloading certificate. Please try again.
dp.help_overview_text: This dashboard is your control center for the proficiency test. Here you manage your samples, start evaluations and track progress.
dp.help_sample_1: Each sample contains a questioned fingerprint and several standards for comparison.
dp.help_sample_2: Click 'Start Analysis' to open the evaluation screen for a sample.
dp.help_sample_3: You can request new samples by clicking 'New Sample' in the header.
dp.help_action_1: Start Analysis: opens the evaluation to compare fingerprints.
dp.help_action_2: Download ZIP: downloads the sample images in compressed format.
dp.help_action_3: Certificate: available after completing the evaluation, downloads the participation certificate.
dp.help_action_4: Abandon: discards a pending sample (irreversible action).
dp.help_pending_desc: the sample has not been evaluated yet.
dp.help_completed_desc: the evaluation is complete and the certificate is available.

forgot_code.title: Forgot My Code
forgot_code.subtitle: Enter your email to receive your access codes
forgot_code.step_validate: If your email has not been validated, click the validation link
forgot_code.step_login: If already validated, use the codes sent to log in
forgot_code.not_registered_msg: If this email is registered, you will receive an email with instructions. Otherwise, you can register now.

eval.title: Sample Evaluation
eval.no_groups_desc: Could not load or create groups for this sample.
eval.progress_saved_desc: Complete all fields to save to server.
eval.incomplete_desc: {n} group(s) still need to be evaluated.
eval.help_objective_text: Compare the questioned fingerprint (left panel) with the available standards and determine if there is a match.
eval.help_nav_1: Click the thumbnails (right panel) to view a standard in the center panel.
eval.help_nav_2: Use the numbered buttons or Previous/Next to navigate between groups.
eval.help_nav_3: Navigating between groups automatically saves the current group if it is complete.
eval.help_zoom_1: Right-click + drag: Activates the magnifying lens to zoom the image.
eval.help_zoom_2: Mouse scroll (with lens active): Adjusts the zoom level.
eval.help_min_1: Left-click on the image: Adds a minutia marker.
eval.help_min_2: Double left-click on a marker: Removes the marker.
eval.help_min_3: Use the "Minutiae" checkbox in the panel header to show/hide markers.
eval.help_min_4: Markers are saved automatically to the server.
eval.help_form_1: Is the analysis conclusive? - Indicate whether a conclusion was reached.
eval.help_form_2: Is there a match? - If conclusive, indicate whether the questioned print matches any standard.
eval.help_form_3: Degree of compatibility - If there is a match, indicate the degree (1 to 4, where 4 is highest certainty).
eval.help_form_reset: Use the X button next to each question to clear the answer (also clears dependent answers).
eval.help_save_1: Save Group: Saves the current group to the server (requires complete form).
eval.help_save_2: Finish: Available only when all groups have been evaluated.
eval.help_save_3: The colored indicators show the status:

sample.title: Sample Details
sample.no_groups: No groups available in this sample.

group.title: Group Evaluation
group.instruction: Compare the questioned fingerprint with the standard fingerprints and record your conclusion.
group.select_match: Indicate if there is a match

errors.not_found_desc: The page you are looking for does not exist.

verify.please_wait: Please wait while we validate your email.
